title: Golden Triangle Classic
description: Experience India's iconic trio: witness the Taj Mahal at sunrise, explore Jaipur's pink-hued palaces, and discover Delhi's rich heritage.
fullDescription: This carefully crafted journey takes you through India's most celebrated destinations. From the bustling streets of Delhi to the romantic beauty of the Taj Mahal and the regal splendor of Jaipur, you'll experience the very best of India's cultural heritage.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Delhi
itinerary.description: Welcome to India! Meet your guide and transfer to your heritage hotel.

itinerary.title: Explore Delhi
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Old and New Delhi, including Red Fort and India Gate.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Agra
itinerary.description: Drive to Agra. Afternoon visit to Agra Fort.

itinerary.title: Taj Mahal & Fatehpur Sikri
itinerary.description: Sunrise at Taj Mahal, then explore the abandoned city of Fatehpur Sikri.

itinerary.title: Agra to Jaipur
itinerary.description: Drive to Jaipur with a stop at Abhaneri stepwell.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and local bazaars.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for your onward journey.

title: Royal Rajasthan
description: Journey through the land of Maharajas, staying in heritage palace hotels and experiencing royal traditions.
fullDescription: Immerse yourself in the regal splendor of Rajasthan. This journey takes you through the state's most magnificent cities, with stays in palace hotels that were once home to royalty.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Exploration
itinerary.description: Amber Fort, City Palace, local markets.

title: Kerala Serenity
description: Cruise through tranquil backwaters, explore tea plantations, and experience Ayurvedic wellness in God's Own Country.
fullDescription: Experience the tropical paradise of Kerala with its lush landscapes, serene backwaters, and ancient wellness traditions.

title: Spiritual Varanasi
description: Witness ancient rituals on the Ganges ghats and follow Buddha's footsteps through India's spiritual heartland.
fullDescription: A transformative journey through India's spiritual centers.

title: Himalayan Adventure
description: Traverse the world's highest motorable roads, camp under starlit skies, and discover ancient Buddhist monasteries.
fullDescription: An adventure through the breathtaking landscapes of Ladakh.

title: Nepal Himalayan Trek
description: Trek through stunning Himalayan landscapes, visit ancient temples, and experience Nepali mountain hospitality.
fullDescription: The ultimate Himalayan adventure combining trekking with cultural exploration.

title: Bhutan: Last Shangri-La
description: Explore the world's happiest kingdom, hike to Tiger's Nest monastery, and immerse in Buddhist traditions.
fullDescription: Discover the magic of Bhutan, where happiness is a national priority.

title: Sri Lanka Explorer
description: Discover ancient ruins, wildlife safaris, pristine beaches, and the world's finest tea plantations.
fullDescription: A comprehensive exploration of Sri Lanka's diverse attractions.
